column1: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
At least once a day, allow yourself the freedom to think and dream for yourself.
As I grow older, I pay less attention to what men say. I just watch what they do.
The man who has no imagination has no wings.
Just remember that you don't have to be what they want you to be.
The mind, once stretched by a new idea, never returns to its original dimensions.
All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
